long_description: Send her off on her own with the fun and stable Electra Hawaii 1 16 in. bike. Great design details and a comfortable seat ensure an awesome start to a lifetime of biking. Sturdy steel frame withstands all sorts of abuse; metal chain cover and fenders help protect child from grime and moving parts. Floral graphics on the frame, fenders and chain guard suit a young lady's tastes; she'll find them on the spring-cushioned saddle as well. Low step-through frame accommodates a wide range of heights and makes mounting and dismounting the saddle quick and easy. Integrated coaster brake is both effective and intuitively simple to use-just have her pedal in reverse. With a single speed and coaster brakes, the child-size Hawaii is simplicity itself; there are no shifters or hand brakes to concern a new rider. Removable training wheels make learning easy and do wonders for a child's comfort level. Ergonomic saddle helps balance the child atop the bike in comfort; handlebar design accommodates an upright ride and enhances control. The Electra Hawaii 1 16 in. girls' bike features wide balloon tires that enhance stability and traction. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: Send her off on her own with the fun and stable Electra Hawaii 1 16 in. bike. Great design details and a comfortable seat ensure an awesome start to a lifetime of biking.
